@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Montserrat&family=Open+Sans:wght@300;400&display=swap');.movie-info{display: flex;justify-content: center;flex-flow: row;position:relative;width:95%;height:240px;left:2%;margin 0 0 3% 0;}.poster{max-width:auto;max-height:100%;position:relative;box-shadow: 2px 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.5);border-radius:5px;}.detail{display:flex;flex-flow:column;background-color:#282e39;width:100%;position:relative;left:1.5%;border-radius:5px;}.detail  .title{position:relative;font-size:24pt;font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;font-weight:400;color:white;line-height:0.1em;height:auto;}.detail  .info{display:flex;justify-content:space-around;font-size:10pt;font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;font-weight:400;color:#e3e3e3;line-height:0.1em;margin: 0 0 0 0;}.detail  .list{color:#c9c9c9;font-size:10pt;font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif;font-weight:300;position:relative;right:4%;list-style:none;line-height:3em;}.detail  .plot{color:#c9c9c9;font-size:10pt;font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif;font-weight:300;position:relative;left:5%;line-height:1.2em;width:90%;}.rate{position:absolute;left:70%;top:85%;}.rate  span{font-size:15pt;font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;font-weight:400;letter-spacing:0;color:#e3e3e3;margin:-10px 0 0 5px;}.rate  i{color:orange;transform:scale(0.8);}@media screen and (max-width: 600px){.movie-info{display:block;left:0%;height:auto;}.poster{left:25%;width:50%;}.detail{left:2.8%;}.detail  .title{font-size:2.5rem;}.detail  .info{font-size:1rem;	}.detail  .list{	font-size:1rem;line-height:2.5em;}.rate{left:65%;top:82%;}.rate  span{font-size:2rem;margin:-10px 0 0 5px;}}Soul
2020100 minAnimation, Adventure, Comedy導演 : Pete Docter, Kemp Powers(co-director)演員 : Jamie Foxx, Tina Fey, Graham Norton, Rachel House國家 : USA7.8 / 10aaaa動作冒險開放世界《電馭叛客 2077》將讓你深入沉溺於肉體改造、爭權奪利又紙醉金迷的巨型都市「夜城」。化身非法傭兵 V，尋找某種絕無僅有的植入物，掌握長生不死的關鍵。自由打造角色的生化改造裝置、技能及遊玩風格，並盡情探索一望無際的巨型城市，讓每一次抉擇逐步左右劇情與世界的走向。
